post:
Hi guys,

We've got some killer deals for the run up of our 1 year birthday (April) and as a thank you for how far we have come in just a year. Make sure you get one because they're going quick!

VZ GER
 
1024MB DEDICATED RAM
512MB VSwap
60GB DEDICATED DISK
750GB PREMIUM BW
MULTIPLE LINUX OS'S
1 IPV4 / 10 IPV6
$4.25
[Order](https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=6)

KVM GER

4 Cores @ 2.0hz
1GB Dedicated RAM
50GB RAID 10 Backed DISK
Unmetered Inbound / 350GB Out
2x1000 mbit fully burstable
1 Dedicated IPv4
Linux Only (Windows on request, if you have a valid license)
$6.95/mo
[Order](https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=35)

KVM LA
4 Cores @ 2.1Ghz
**2GB Dedicated RAM**
10GB SAS Disk space
1000GB Bandwidth
100mbit port
1 Dedicated IPv4
Linux + Windows
$6.95/mo
[Order](https://nodedeploy.com/clients/cart.php?a=add&pid=42)

As usual be sure to check out our server status page [here](http://status.nodedeploy.com) and our stock status [here](http://vpsstock.com)

Something else you want? Sure! Ding us a ticket... our friendly monkeys are waiting :-)
